data.text: @fantseepants @juju_bad Yup, plus Glover won 2 Emmys in 2017, for best actor and director, and won 2 Golden Globes in addition to multiple Emmy nominations this year
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge killing eve was AMAZING but so creepy haha
@poniewozik @EWDocJensen @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Sometimes people are more offended by the shows on a list than the ones not on a list!
@juju_bad Didn't it get like 6 or 7 Emmy noms this year?
@poniewozik @nytimes @mikehalenyt @margeincharge I respect your candor, jerkface.

@poniewozik @nytimes @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Best show: Atlanta. The "critics" ignore this show during award season just like the .@RecordingAcad ignore the contributions of black artists (esp. Beyonce) for all the phenomenal work that they do.
@poniewozik @nytimes @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Amazing how bad the 3 big newtork shows are compared to steaming services.
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge More that you get paid a full time salary to make such a list whereas I and most others make ours for free
@poniewozik I'm ashamed to admit I hadn't even heard of "America to Me."  Tnank God for On Demand, and thank YOU for including it on your list.
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Happy to see you included Money Heist, but I cannot forgive you for leaving out My Brilliant Friend
@sepinwall @poniewozik prefer more murdery deer https://t.co/vQLdA6ydYS
@sepinwall @poniewozik NOW I'M THINKING ABOUT THE DEER IN THE WOODS, THANKS A LOT ALAN
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge third setting added, sir (said in a Lt. Data voice)
@moryan @mikehalenyt @margeincharge You forgot "You Forgot"
@poniewozik I'm asking you to pick AMERICA TO ME. Cheers!

@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge now I set off the only-to-critics "but what about" bot, which will torture you all with things you left off the list that I liked. The bot's two settings are "but what about" and "HOW DARE YOU."
@moryan @sepinwall @poniewozik 11 11 11 11 11
@moryan @sepinwall @poniewozik Do I what I've been doing: whenever you see a reference to HERE AND NOW, intentionally mis-remember and think about the sublime ONCE AND AGAIN instead.
@sepinwall @poniewozik WHY ARE YOU REMINDING ME I WATCHED HERE AND NOW ALAN

@poniewozik PBS made cuts to all of Downton Abbey but at least the DVDs sold in the US were the UK versions. The Man in the Orange Shirt also had several minutes cut on PBS and sadly content of the US bluray differs from the UK Blu-ray.
@ydavey This is not the only instance of this I've heard of, although maddeningly I can't think of another example now.

@poniewozik Note to @mikehalenyt: Did you know that @PBS edits out plot lines when they show Unforgotten? I learned this when I read an episode recap online on a Brit website. One character’s actions were missing. I wish they’d stop.

@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge I'd make your Barry/Killing Eve pick a trifecta by adding Get Shorty. I didn't expect to like any of these (especially Barry) and found all three addictive. Or maybe you hated Get Shorty.
@aherman2006 @poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Whew. It passes the Baranski Test, which is my Bechdel Test for 2018 TV Top 10 lists. I microdosed a lot of great television this year.
@aherman2006 @scott_tobias @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Wait, there's more than one list
@scott_tobias @poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge scott check OUR list, the only valid list!!!! (idk what this new york times business is, seems sketchy)
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge https://t.co/g73beomMaj
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Nowadays I use these lists as suggestions of what to watch, and why. Thus you're performing a valuable service for TV viewers. Thank you.

Addendum: though I don't rank my list (I don't believe in it & they didn't make me), most years I have a pretty clear idea what my number-one would be. Not this year--I'd probably pick Atlanta or America to Me each 50% of the time, depending when you asked me.
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge I KNEW it!
@poniewozik @mikehalenyt @margeincharge Are you doing a best episodes list? Always a fan of those.
